org.strongback.components

Interface Compass

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AngleSensor, Zeroable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Gyroscope

    @ThreadSafe
public interface Compass
extends AngleSensor
    A sensor that determines the positional heading, or angular displacement, in degrees. A compass is an AngleSensor with an additional method to determine heading. It also can be zeroed to return angles and heading relative to another. Negative values are assumed to be counter-clockwise and positive values are clockwise.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default double computeHeadingChangeTo(double targetHeading, double tolerance)
      Compute the change in heading between the current heading and the target heading, using the given tolerance for the difference.
      static Compass create(DoubleSupplier angleSupplier)
      Create a angle sensor for the given function that returns the angle.
      default double getHeading()
      Gets the angular displacement of in degrees in the range [0, 360).

      • Methods inherited from interface org.strongback.components.AngleSensor

        computeAngleChangeTo, getAngle, invert, zero

    • Method Detail

      • getHeading

        default double getHeading()
        Gets the angular displacement of in degrees in the range [0, 360).
        Returns:
        the heading of this Compass

      • computeHeadingChangeTo

        default double computeHeadingChangeTo(double targetHeading,
                                      double tolerance)
        Compute the change in heading between the current heading and the target heading, using the given tolerance for the difference. The result is the angle that this sensor must rotate to reach the target heading, which may be positive or negative.
        Parameters:
        targetHeading - the target heading
        tolerance - the allowed tolerance in degrees between the two headings
        Returns:
        the angular displacement required for this sensor to reach the target heading, or 0.0d if the two headings are already within the specified tolerance

      • create

        static Compass create(DoubleSupplier angleSupplier)
        Create a angle sensor for the given function that returns the angle.
        Specified by:
        create in interface AngleSensor
        Parameters:
        angleSupplier - the function that returns the angle; may not be null
        Returns:
        the angle sensor
